education_text.0: Scott Elliott Fahlman (born March 21, 1948) is an American      Computer scientist computer scientist and      Professor      Emeritus at      Carnegie Mellon University Carnegie Mellon University's      Language Technologies Institute Language Technologies Institute and Computer Science DepartmentScott Elliott Fahlman (born March 21, 1948) is an American      Computer scientist computer scientist and      Professor      Emeritus at      Carnegie Mellon University Carnegie Mellon University's      Language Technologies Institute Language Technologies Institute and Computer Science DepartmentFrom May 1996 to July 2001, Fahlman directed the      Justsystem Pittsburgh Research Center Justsystem Pittsburgh Research Center
